title: FS: Lot of 5 Low Grade T207 w/ Snodgrass and Perdue **PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 5 Low Grade T207 w/ Snodgrass and Perdue **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T207 cards available for sale. The Perdue and Snodgrass are two of the tougher Recruit class cards in the set. These two don't come up for sale too often.

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards.  3 or more ship for free.

I accept payment via any method you prefer and will gladly consider trades for anything that I need from any other sets. I collect just about everything. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

Cards Pictured:

Danforth - **SOLD**
Kaler - $12
Krause - $12
Perdue $45
Snodgrass (PSA 2...scratch near face is on the holder and not the card) - $35
Price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
